stateCompliance.headline: Understanding Title Loan Laws in California
stateCompliance.content: Residents of Los Angeles benefit from California's strong consumer protection laws enforced by the Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI).
keyPoints: California caps title loan interest at 30% APR
All lenders must be licensed by DFPI
Lenders must provide clear disclosure of all costs
Verify lender license at dfpi.ca.gov before signing
stateCompliance.regulatoryBody: Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI)
stateCompliance.disclaimer: This information is for general educational purposes only and may not reflect the most current legal developments. Laws and regulations change frequently. Always consult with a licensed attorney or contact the California DFPI at (866) 275-2677 or visit dfpi.ca.gov for the most accurate and up-to-date information before making any financial decisions.

localReviews.headline: What Our Los Angeles Customers Say

reviews.name: Michael R.
reviews.text: Fast and professional service at the Hollywood location. They explained everything clearly and I got my cash the same day. The staff was friendly and made the process easy.

reviews.name: Sarah T.
reviews.text: Needed emergency cash for car repairs. Direct Title Loans came through when my bank couldn't help. Great rates and no hidden fees. Highly recommend!

reviews.name: David L.
reviews.text: Good experience overall. The location near Griffith Observatory was easy to find. Got approved quickly even with my credit issues. Will use again if needed.

nearbyLocations.headline: Also Serving Nearby Cities
nearbyLocations.intro: Can't make it to our Los Angeles location? We also serve:

faq.question: Where is your Los Angeles location?
faq.answer: Our Los Angeles branch is located at 4521 Hollywood Blvd, Suite 100, right across from Griffith Observatory. Take US-101 (Hollywood Freeway) and exit at Hollywood Blvd for the quickest route.

faq.question: What are your hours in Los Angeles?
faq.answer: We're open Monday-Friday 9 AM to 6 PM, Saturday 10 AM to 4 PM. We're closed on Sundays. Online applications are accepted 24/7.

faq.question: Do I need an appointment at the Los Angeles location?
faq.answer: No appointment needed! Walk-ins are welcome at our Hollywood branch. However, you can apply online first to speed up the process.

faq.question: What do I need to bring to the Los Angeles branch?
faq.answer: Bring your vehicle, clear title in your name, valid California driver's license or state ID, and proof of income. We'll handle the rest.

faq.question: How much can I borrow in California?
faq.answer: California title loans start at a minimum of $2,500 and go up based on your vehicle's value. Interest rates are capped at 30% APR by California law.

faq.question: Is Direct Title Loans licensed in California?
faq.answer: Yes, we are licensed by the California Department of Financial Protection and Innovation (DFPI). You can verify our license at dfpi.ca.gov/verify-a-license.
